original_text: But if the man has hurt the woman a lot, you must punish him as he deserves. Take a life for a life, 24 an eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth, a hand for a hand, a foot for a foot.
korean_text: 그러나 다른 해가 있으면 갚되 생명은 생명으로,

sentences.original_text: But if the man has hurt the woman a lot
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 그 남자가 그 여자를 많이 상처 입혔다면

sentences.original_text: you must punish him as he deserves
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그가 마땅히 받아야 할 대로 그를 벌해야 한다

sentences.original_text: Take a life for a life
